Module cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool

Class SelectedItemPanelGame

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.SelectedItemPanelGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
ShowSelected
public class SelectedItemPanelGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements ShowSelected
AnchorPane showing the selected Item within the Game window. If the item is selected from inventory, panel also offers some functions, such as using the item, selling the item or discarding the item from the game.
